description:
Alek is originally from Eastern Europe and he moved to the United States about ten years ago. He loves it here but admits to really missing football — or what we in America call soccer. He’s joined local soccer camps and school teams, but he says it’s just not the same the same — according to him, Europeans have a passion for (anything related to) soccer that is 100 times more than Americans have for football.
He wanted to know if we had soccer fields or where they might be playing some matches. So we went to the park to see him in action. He wasn’t kidding about his passion for the sport. He’s a monster on the field and for a tall guy (6’5”) he’s quick. And, like any good soccer player, he hit some phenomenal headers. One hit his head so hard I thought he was going to give himself a concussion. When I asked him if it hurt, his response was, “It always feels good!”
Even in clothes, you can tell Alek is athletic. Once the clothes come off, you see he's built — lean and defined with thick, muscular legs and a round, hairy bubble ass. There’s a cool confidence about him that’s infectious, like he’s always on top of the world. But, he’s also a jokester who prides himself on being somewhat of a cheese-ball. It’s nice that he doesn’t take himself so seriously.
Alek is uncut and he’s got some serious foreskin, which he says makes masturbating extra pleasurable!
title: Alek
